pages.title: Arcanoid
pages.display_description: This assignment for my game design module in my second year of university has been the most enjoyable so far. It was a very open assignment, so as long as I had a basic implementation of the old arcade game Arcanoid, I'd pass, but I added a few extra features for fun, and it was fun to improve my game development practices from the last game I made with Unity, Turbo Racing for my A level coursework.
